parameter.name: number_of_settings
parameter.title: Number of Settings Objects
parameter.comment: Number of Settings Objects

parameter.name: number_of_structures
parameter.title: Number of Structures
parameter.comment: Number of Structure Objects

parameter.name: number_of_actions
parameter.title: Number of Actions
parameter.comment: Number of Action Objects present in input file

parameter.name: number_of_basis_sets
parameter.title: Number of Basis Set Objects
parameter.comment: Number of Basis Set Objects

parameter.name: total_number_of_atoms
parameter.title: Total Number of Atoms in Objects

parameter.name: total_number_of_shells
parameter.title: Total Number of Shells in all Basis Set Definitions
parameter.comment: Number of shells (with quantum number n for atom_type) in all input basis sets.

parameter.name: total_number_of_subshells
parameter.title: Number of Sub shells in Basis Set Definitions
parameter.comment: Number of subshells in all input basis sets.

parameter.name: total_number_of_folders
parameter.title: Total Number of Folders in all Basis Set Definitions
parameter.comment: Number of folders (with quantum number n for atom_type) in all input basis sets.

parameter.name: total_number_of_scf_en
parameter.comment: Total number of 'scf_iteration_energetics' in the input file.

parameter.name: number_of_scf_energetics
parameter.comment: Total number of 'scf_energetics' objects in the input file.

settings_input.name: settings
settings_input.comment: Type containing all the settings related to functionalities.

class.name: function3d_settings
class.comment: Type containing settings related to the Function3D objects

parameter.name: bubble_cell_count
parameter.title: Bubble Cell Count
parameter.comment: Number of cells used in the Bubbles objects (Note: the number is scaled with corresponding atom charge)

parameter.name: bubble_lmax
parameter.title: Bubble Maximum-l
parameter.comment: Maximum angular momentum quantum number l used in Bubbles objects.

parameter.name: bubble_cutoff_radius
parameter.title: Bubble Cutoff Radius
parameter.comment: The radius from bubbles centers, where the Bubbles ends.

parameter.name: cube_grid_spacing
parameter.title: Cube Grid Spacing
parameter.comment: The spacing between grid points in cube in atomic units (a0). Note: the actual number is scaled to fit other parameter values.

parameter.name: cube_cutoff_radius
parameter.title: Cube Cutoff Radius
parameter.comment: The radius from atoms centers, where the cube ends.

parameter.name: bubbles_center_offset
parameter.title: Bubbles center offset
parameter.comment: The offset of bubbles from the center of the cube. This offset is given as cube grid points in x, y and z directions.

parameter.name: bubbles_nlip
parameter.title: Bubbles LIP Count
parameter.comment: Number of Lagrange interpolation polynomials used in Cube grid.

parameter.name: cube_nlip
parameter.title: Cube LIP Count
parameter.comment: Number of Lagrange interpolation polynomials used in Bubbles grids.

parameter.name: taylor_order
parameter.title: Taylor Order in Multiplication
parameter.comment: Maximum derivate order used in creating the cross terms in Function3D multiplication

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the Gaussian Quadrature objects used in Coulomb and Helmholtz operators
class.name: quadrature_settings

parameter.name: nlin
parameter.title: Linear Parameter Count
parameter.comment: Number of linear parameters used in gaussian quadrature.

parameter.name: nlog
parameter.title: Logarithmic Parameter Count
parameter.comment: Number of logarithmic parameters used in gaussian quadrature.

parameter.name: tstart
parameter.title: t-start value
parameter.comment: t-start value

parameter.name: tlin
parameter.title: t-lin value
parameter.comment: t-lin value

parameter.name: tlog
parameter.title: t-log value
parameter.comment: t-log value

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the Coulomb operator
class.name: coulomb3d_settings

parameter.name: gbfmm
parameter.title: Toggle GBFMM
parameter.comment: Is the used coulomb operator based on Grid Based Fast Multipole Method

parameter.title: l-maximum
parameter.name: farfield_potential_input_lmax
parameter.comment: Maximum angular momentum quantum number l value for the multipole evaluation. Increasing this number will increase the accuracy of the farfield potential evaluation.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the Helmholtz operator
class.name: helmholtz3d_settings

parameter.name: gbfmm
parameter.title: Toggle GBFMM
parameter.comment: Is the used helmholtz operator based on Grid Based Fast Multipole Method

parameter.title: Farfield Input l-maximum
parameter.name: farfield_potential_input_lmax
parameter.comment: Maximum angular momentum quantum number l value for the multipole evaluation. Increasing this number will increase the accuracy of the farfield potential evaluation.

parameter.title: Farfield l-maximum
parameter.name: farfield_potential_lmax
parameter.comment: Maximum angular momentum quantum number l value for the potential evaluation. Increasing this number will increase the accuracy of the farfield potential evaluation.

parameter.name: multipole_evaluation
parameter.comment: If the evaluation of farfield potential will be made using with no multipole to local expansion conversions. Using this setting will increase the execution time. Should be used only for debugging purposes.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the quantum dot simulations.
class.name: qd_settings

parameter.name: electron_effective_mass_x
parameter.title: Electron's effective mass (x-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of electron in the x-direction.

parameter.name: electron_effective_mass_y
parameter.title: Electron's effective mass (y-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of electron in the y-direction.

parameter.name: electron_effective_mass_z
parameter.title: Electron's effective mass (z-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of electron in the z-direction.

parameter.name: hole_effective_mass_x
parameter.title: Hole's effective mass (x-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of hole in the x-direction.

parameter.name: hole_effective_mass_y
parameter.title: Hole's effective mass (y-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of hole in the y-direction.

parameter.name: hole_effective_mass_z
parameter.title: Hole's effective mass (z-axis)
parameter.comment: Effective mass of hole in the z-direction.

parameter.name: electronic_constant
parameter.title: Electronic constant
parameter.comment: Electronic constant.

parameter.name: relative_electron_diffraction_constant
parameter.title: Relative electron diffraction constant
parameter.comment: Relative electron diffraction constant.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the SCF loop
class.name: scf_settings

parameter.name: method
parameter.comment: Type of the ab initio calculation

parameter.name: type
parameter.title: Type
parameter.comment: Determines the type of SCF loop: LCMO or Helmholtz-SCF.

option.comment: Linear Combination of Molecular Orbitals SCF.

parameter.name: update_weight
parameter.title: Update weight
parameter.comment: The weight with which the update is applied.

parameter.name: restricted
parameter.title: Restricted
parameter.comment: Determines if the calculation is restricted to singlet electronic configurations.

class.comment: Type containing settings specifically related to the Hartree-Fock.
class.name: hf_settings

parameter.name: rohf_f
parameter.comment: The f-parameter used for the open shells in the Restricted Open-Shell Hartree Fock calculations.

parameter.name: rohf_a
parameter.comment: The a-parameter used for the open shells in the Restricted Open-Shell Hartree Fock calculations.

parameter.name: rohf_b
parameter.comment: The b-parameter used for the open shells in the Restricted Open-Shell Hartree Fock calculations.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the DFT and exchange and correlation.
class.name: dft_settings

parameter.name: exchange_type
parameter.comment: Type of the exchange functional

parameter.name: correlation_type
parameter.comment: Type of the correlation functional

parameter.name: xc_update_method
parameter.comment: method to update xc object

parameter.name: xc_lmax
parameter.comment: lmax for exc, vxc

parameter.name: orbitals_density_evaluation
parameter.title: Molecular orbitals density evaluation
parameter.comment: Determines if the electron density and its gradient are (re-)evaluated from molecular orbitals. Using this setting makes the calculation more accurate but slows it down a bit.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the SCF optimizer
class.name: scfoptimizer_settings

option.comment: Basis set consisting of Slater Type Orbitals.

parameter.name: maximum_iterations
parameter.title: Max iteration count
parameter.comment: The maximum number of scf-loop iterations.

parameter.title: Total Energy Convergence Threshold
parameter.name: total_energy_convergence_threshold
parameter.comment: Maximum error allowed for the total energy to achieve SCF-convergence.

parameter.title: Eigenvalue Convergence Threshold
parameter.name: eigenvalue_convergence_threshold
parameter.comment: Maximum error allowed for each eigenvalue to achieve SCF-convergence.

parameter.title: Stored Iteration Count
parameter.name: stored_iteration_count
parameter.comment: Number of iterations stored in memory. This parameter only affects to optimizers taking advantage of iteration history, like DIIS and KAIN.

parameter.title: Initialization Iteration Count
parameter.name: initialization_iteration_count
parameter.comment: Number of iterations needed to before the optimization method of the optimizer is used. Before this, the power method is used.

parameter.title: Initialization Threshold
parameter.name: initialization_threshold
parameter.comment: Maximum error for the optimization method of the optimizer is used. If this threshold has not been breached, the power method is used.

class.comment: Type containing settings related to the Configuration Interaction
class.name: ci_settings

parameter.name: evaluate_ci
parameter.title: Evaluate CI
parameter.comment: Determines if CI-contribution to energy is evaluated.

parameter.name: singles
parameter.title: Include Single-Excitations
parameter.comment: Determines if single-excitations are included in the calculation.

parameter.name: doubles
parameter.title: Include Double-Excitations
parameter.comment: Determines if double-excitations are included in the calculation.

parameter.name: triples
parameter.title: Include Triple-Excitations
parameter.comment: Determines if triple-excitations are included in the calculation.

parameter.name: quadruples
parameter.title: Include Quadruple-Excitations
parameter.comment: Determines if quadruple-excitations are included in the calculation.

parameter.name: external_electric_field
parameter.title: External electric field
parameter.comment: homogeneous electric field

parameter.name: multiplicity
parameter.comment: Spin multiplicity of the electronic state.

parameter.name: atom_type
parameter.title: Atom Type
parameter.comment: Index linking the basis set with the 'atom type' of structure. By default the 'atom_type' is the order number of atom in periodic table, but other values can also be given.

parameter.name: number_of_basis_functions
parameter.title: Number of basis functions
parameter.comment: The number of basis functions used for this atom. If -1 the number of available basis functions is used.

parameter.name: ignored_basis_functions
parameter.title: Ignored basis functions
parameter.comment: Indeces of the ignored basis functions

parameter.name: name
parameter.title: Name of the Structure
parameter.comment: Name or abbreviation identifying the structure.

parameter.name: basis_set_name
parameter.title: Basis set
parameter.comment: Name or abbreviation of the used basis set.

parameter.name: basis_set_id
parameter.comment: Order number of the used basis set in input basis sets.

parameter.name: orbital_coefficients
parameter.title: Basis set function coefficients. The real size depends on the size of the basis set.

parameter.name: structure_name
parameter.title: Basis set
parameter.comment: Name or abbreviation of the used structure.

parameter.name: settings_name
parameter.title: Settings name
parameter.comment: Name or abbreviation of the used settings.

parameter.name: resume
parameter.title: Resume Previous Run
parameter.comment: Resume to previous execution by reading in the orbitals etc. if possible

parameter.name: intermediate_orbital_store_interval
parameter.title: Intermediate Orbital Store Interval
parameter.comment: The interval of mid-storing of orbitals as number of iterations. (0: no mid-execution storage)

parameter.name: store_result_functions
parameter.title: Store Result Functions
parameter.comment: Store the result orbitals and other functions.

parameter.name: input_folder
parameter.title: Input Folder
parameter.comment: The path to the folder where the input files (orbitals etc) are stored to.

parameter.name: output_folder
parameter.title: Output Folder
parameter.comment: The path to the folder where the output files are stored to.

parameter.name: name
parameter.comment: Name of Abbreviation used to identify the Basis set in input files.

option.comment: Basis set consisting of Slater Type Orbitals.
Basis set consisting of Gaussian Type Orbitals.
Basis set consisting of orbitals made of Bubbles.

parameter.name: size
parameter.title: Maximum Number of Elementary Basis Functions Per Orbital
parameter.comment: This parameter is used to determine the order number in the basis set type. For instance if the basis set is of type GTO and this parameter is '5' then each basis function consist of 1-5 gaussian functions.

parameter.name: number_of_shells
parameter.title: Number of Shells
parameter.comment: Number of 'shells' in current basis set.

parameter.name: number_of_subshells
parameter.comment: Number of sub shells in this basis set. This is actually the size of the basis set in number of basis functions.

parameter.name: atom_type
parameter.title: Atom Type
parameter.comment: Index linking the basis set with the 'atom type' of structure. By default the 'atom_type' is the order number of atom in periodic table, but other values can also be given.

parameter.name: exponentials
parameter.title: Parameters used in exponent of the exponential term of the basis function.

parameter.name: local_number_of_subshells
parameter.comment: Number of shells for this atom type

parameter.name: l
parameter.title: Quantum Number 'l'
parameter.comment: Azimuthal quantum number 'l' of the subshell.

parameter.name: coefficients
parameter.title: Coefficients used for each basis function for atom type.

parameter.name: number_of_folders
parameter.comment: Number of atom folders in this basis set.

parameter.name: restricted
parameter.comment: Indicates if the basis set is of restricted type.

parameter.name: folder_atom_type
parameter.title: Atom Type
parameter.comment: Index linking the basis set with the 'atom type' of structure. By default the 'atom_type' is the order number of atom in periodic table, but other values can also be given.

parameter.name: folder_path
parameter.title: Folder Path
parameter.comment: Path of the folder containing the orbitals of the given atom

scf_energetics_input.name: scf_energetics
scf_energetics_input.comment: The object used to store all the energetics of an electron density optimization

parameter.name: number_of_scf_en
parameter.comment: Number of 'scf_iteration_energetics' in this object.

parameter.name: nuclear_repulsion_energy
parameter.comment: Repulsion energy between nuclei.

parameter.name: iteration_number
parameter.title: Order number of iteration.
parameter.comment: The order numbers of iterations.

parameter.name: total_energy
parameter.title: Total energy of the iteration.
parameter.comment: The total energy of the iterations.

parameter.name: eigen_values
parameter.title: Eigen values of orbitals.
parameter.comment: The eigen values of orbitals in the iterations.
